locations.description:
Home delivery is available to the elderly and disabled living in the 48173 and 48179 zip codes. If a person is new to the Giving Basket or some extreme emergency occurs food can be obtained by scheduling a time to pick it up with the parish office 734 379 9248.
A hot meal is prepared each Thursday for those in need.  Meals are carry out.
